title: I just finished my 13th match in a row, trying to end my play session on a high note
body:
But, in every match, either my own team trash talks us for not winning hard enough (which tilts us so we lose), or the enemy team trash talks us after they win a 5v4, or someone on my team AFKs and turns it into a 4v5, or someone on my team trash talks me for saying "gg" a few minutes before we lose, or I comment on how the enemy team was nice and so they fix that by calling me trash, or we're winning handily so a teammate fixes that by walking around aimlessly while being attacked until we lose the prize fight. And if I bring any of this up here, the same nasty, vicious people will happily join in on the fun to make my day miserable.

But the joke's on them.

I already was.

And now I realize there is no high note in this game.
